Upgrades to this home include vinyl siding, some vinyl windows, dark laminate flooring on main, new carpet in basement, newly reno'd main bathroom with solid cabinets/quartz countertop, fixtures, fresh paint and new high-eff gas furnace! 3 bedrooms up/2 down, 2 full baths. Large LR, bright galley kitchen with eating area. Full basement featuring 2 bedrooms with walk-in closets, recently updated 3-pc bath, and cozy family room with wood stove. Immediate possession available.

Beautifully updated 5 bedroom, 3 bath home with in-law suite. Walking distance to elementary school. Walk into this spacious living room with vaulted ceilings and wood-burning fireplace. The dining room adjoins beautiful, brand new kitchen with new appliances. 4-pc main bathroom has been renovated. 3 bedrooms up, master with 2-pc ensuite and walk-in. Main floor all new laminate, and has spacious deck off the dining room. Bright daylight basement with 2-bedroom in-law suite. 4-pc bathroom down. Separate entrance in laundry room. Newer roof, copper wiring, priced for quick sale!

Adorable, well-maintained home backing onto elementary school yard, within walking distance of shopping, restaurants and hospital. Gorgeous new kitchen with pantry and tall cabinets. Lots of cupboard and counter space with work with! French doors from the eating area in kitchen to a large deck in the private backyard. 3 bedrooms upstairs and a guest room down. Family room downstairs and 3pc bathroom plus laundry and storage rooms. Vinyl windows throughout home and new shingles on roof in 2016. Updated doors and alarm system. Electrical is up to code and new drain is on driveway side in 2014. Backyard access with shed.
Realtor Remarks: All measurements are approximate and buyer to verify if deemed important. Furnace 1995, hwt 1998, deck 2011, kitchen reno 2015, windows 2010, electrical pigtailed 2014.

Public Remarks: Beautifully updated 1 bedroom unit in the Woodgreen Apartment Complex. Very well located to downtown and transit, this is ideal urban living at its finest! The gorgeous feature fireplace is the centerpiece of the living space, and along with the warm flooring, creates a feeling of comfort and rest. The den is a perfect workspace separate from the living room, while a handy in-suite store room is great for seasonal items and some gear. Quietly set on the second floor, this unit is economical, convenient, and cozy.

Perfect starter home. Also makes a great investment that attracts quality tenants. Quiet & bright unit.

Sun shines in the backyard all afternoon and evening, the ideal place to sit around the fire pit and watch the sun set.

Affordable country home with many updates. There is an island kitchen with a built-in rangetop and breakfast bar. Don't miss the built-in oven and dishwasher. This home has excellent suite potential, with outside basement entrance and roughed-in plumbing. Over the last 2 years, the furnace, hot water tank roof and siding have all been replaced, as well as many windows. This is a great home for anyone starting out or wanting to downsize.

This 4.44 acre parcel has an excellent Southwest View across Georgia Strait to Vancouver Island. The land is partially cleared and zoned Agriculture, which allows more than one residence (with some restrictions), plus barns, and a multitude of farm uses. Light & bright with lots of sun & “Big Sky”. Located on the Gibsons side of Roberts Creek just 15 minutes from the Langdale Ferry Terminal. The driveway has been roughed in, a building site has been cleared, & the drilled well produces approximately 15 gallons per minute. There is a network of trails adjacent to the property for hiking & horseback riding. View acreage with a rural setting is very unique & hard to find so close to all amenities.
